page.title: 01LANDSCAPE
page.content: {LANDSCAPE { (Letters refer to grid squares. A,B,C :N/S .A,D,G,J:W/E) A=Heather,rough grass,gorse B=Heather,rough grass,gorse C=Heather,rough grass,gorse,arable D=Heather,gorse,grass,conifer forestry E=Rough grass,heather,gorse F=Arable,game birds G=Arable,rough grazing H=Arable,seeded grass I=Arable J=Forestry,grazing K=Forestry,grazing L=Arable,fish farm {ATTITUDE OF LOCALS TO LANDSCAPE "It's about the only thing there is to enjoy round here!" Many go for long walks. B ROAD,C ROAD and the River Deveron
